Strategic Partnership Opportunity

We are actively looking to partner on the development of 60–70 elevated homes across 32.9 acres through a private-label arrangement—either exclusive or non-exclusive—that would enable the production and deployment of elevated, panelized homes under the Eagles Flock to Woodstock brand. Given your SIP system’s hurricane-rated durability, energy efficiency, and compatibility with pier foundations, we believe there’s strong potential for a strategic alignment. Together, we can deliver a scalable, cost-effective housing solution designed specifically for underserved, flood-prone communities.

 

Our broader vision includes expansion to multiple sites adjacent to municipal wastewater treatment facilities across Mississippi, where our EcoFlow infrastructure can be replicated at scale. We believe this represents a high-impact, niche market—combining environmental restoration with affordable housing and infrastructure modernization.

 

I’ve attached land (each parcels connects adjacent to the other) details for your review and would welcome a follow-up call to explore opportunity.

 

Sincerely,

 

signature_2765690175

Ricky Rayborn
Chief Operations Officer
Reformed Theological Seminary, Institutional
601.923.1643 | <redacted.email> | rts.edu

A mind for truth. A heart for God.®



---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Michael Hoffman <<redacted.email>>
Date: Thu, Jun 19, 2025 at 2:17 PM
Subject: Subject: Following Up - Affordable Housing Development Opportunity in Mississippi
To: <<redacted.email>>

 

Dear Ricky,
